column1: S1/This scholarship is done by SWE. It's for any engineering major and is for women.
Light of Christ/We want to see how you have enhanced your community through connection with the faith.
Merit scholarship/For students who have above a 3.5 GPA
Smith scholarship/We are looking for exemplary candidates who have shown leadership in their academic career
S2/This scholarship is for MENNNNN RAHHHHHHHH
Michelle Obama Scholarship/We want exceptional students who have demonstrated leadership skills
Scholarship 3/We at the FGCSA want to support a first generation college student
Poetry scholarship/Please use the personal essay space to write a (500 words or less) poem!
Transfer students/We at the FXSG want to help you succeed! Please write about your college journey so far.
